document_data.name: Haela's Battle Blessing
document_data.mainbody: '''''Haela's battle blessing''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Haela Brightaxe]].
document_data.Effects: The caster used this spell to provide aid to a comrade during combat. The targeted individuals melee attack against a creature significantly improved.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal]] and [[somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]], the holy symbol of Haela Brightaxe.
